explanations.deep learning: The abstract mentions the integration of artificial intelligence, particularly deep learning, to enhance diagnostic accuracy and data analysis capabilities in cancer detection.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The abstract specifically references convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as part of the AI integration that improves cancer diagnostic capabilities.
explanations.CNN: CNN is an abbreviation for convolutional neural network, which is explicitly mentioned in the abstract as a technology enhancing cancer diagnostics.
